nodes.text: In lightsaber combat, jung ma was a maneuver used by Jedi to perform a 360-degree spin in which power was gained for an imminent attack on the opponent.[source?]
Jung ma and its relative jung, like shun, might be further developments of the Falling Leaf technique known by the Jedi Knights of the Army of Light around 1000 BBY.
Combined with sai tok, a practitioner could slay multiple surrounding opponents with one swift stroke.
